UBER_API_URL.description: JSONRPC Endpoint of the MAGFest Ubersystem you would like to connect to. (ex. https://super2020.reggie.magfest.org/jsonrpc/)

UBER_API_TOKEN.description: API Token of the MAGFest Ubersystem you would like to manage to.

name: tuber
description: Open source event management software, based on Flask and Vue.js.
